name: Meadow
description: An open meadow provides excellent visibility and grazing land, but the lack of cover makes travelers vulnerable to attack. The fertile soil supports agriculture and attracts wildlife, while the open space is perfect for large gatherings or battles.
atmosphere: Peaceful open grassland with fresh air scented of grass and wildflowers. Excellent visibility and sense of freedom. Vulnerability from lack of cover. Abundant wildlife and natural beauty. Fertile soil supports agriculture. Open space perfect for large gatherings.
